camsRad
=======
`camsRad` is R client for CAMS radiation service

## Quick start

### Install

Dev version from GitHub.

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("lukas-rokka/camsRad")
```

```{r}
library("camsRad")
```

### Authentication

To access the CAMS radiation service you need to register at [http://www.soda-pro.com/web-services/radiation/cams-radiation-service](http://www.soda-pro.com/web-services/radiation/cams-radiation-service). The email you use at the registration step will be used for authentication.
